thread.title: Liverpool to snub Newcastle interest in Sheyi Ojo as Jurgen Klopp refuses to sanction loan deal for winger
thread.title_full: Liverpool to snub Newcastle interest in Sheyi Ojo as Jurgen Klopp refuses to sanction loan deal for winger

author: James Pearce
title: Liverpool to snub Newcastle interest in Sheyi Ojo as Jurgen Klopp refuses to sanction loan deal for winger
text:
Sport Liverpool to snub Newcastle interest in Sheyi Ojo as Jurgen Klopp refuses to sanction loan deal for winger The 19-year-old has attracted interest from Newcastle, who were keen to take Ojo until the end of the season but Klopp wants to keep his youngsters at the club Share Ojo is set to feature against Plymouth (Photo: PA) Share Get Liverpool FC   
Jurgen Klopp will not sanction a loan move for Liverpool youngster Sheyi Ojo. 
The 19-year-old has attracted interest from Newcastle, who were keen to take Ojo until the end of the season. 
But Klopp is keen to keep a batch of youngsters at the club as his side compete both in the Premier League and cup competitions, reports the Liverpool Echo. 
The former MK Dons teenager made his first senior appearance of the season in the recent FA Cup stalemate against Plymouth Argyle and is expected to start Wednesday nightâ€™s replay at Home Park. Ojo in action this term (Photo: Liverpool FC via Getty Images) 
Ojo, who was handed his Liverpool debut by Klopp against Exeter City a year ago, missed the first half of the campaign after being diagnosed with a stress fracture in his back in pre-season. 
He returned to training at Melwood in November and then built up his match fitness with the under-23s squad before earning a first-team comeback. poll loading Should Liverpool loan out Sheyi Ojo? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
